resources.string: You are still not connected to any tracking network.Please follow these steps to get started.First make sure your device is bluetooth enabled and paired with your other devices. Then if you need to create server then goto start server activity and start the server. Then from other clients connect to the server using connect to server activity.
This will start a server socket where the other client can be connected to. Please make sure there will be one server socket is enabled and all the other clients are get connected to it.
